node.title: Adventism's Prophetic Role in the Great Controversy
node.description: The 2,300-day prophecy of Daniel 8:14 identifies the second advent movement. Attend this seminar and take a closer look at how the cross and the advent movement are inseparably linked through the longest time prophecy of Scripture. Learn important connections between the 70-week prophecy as it relates to the Messiah and the 2,300 days, and see how Christ’s work on the cross and in the sanctuary in heaven are integrally connected.
